answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Understand your predicament. Follow the protocol outlined by your doctor. And have other conditions like diabetes and hypertension under control, as they could deteriorate the kidney functioning.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hi,I'd renal transplant 6 month back & at time of discharge, my S/C level was 1.1 but after 2-3 months it started increased gradually & currently it was 1.7. My transplant surgeon, advised me for Kidney biopsy (attached herewith) & also for BK Virus Blood test. I again checked S/C & it comes 1.6.Pl suggest is everything okay....
title: High Creatine....
